apps.name: AI Oracle
apps.author: Beran
apps.description: Truth-as-a-Service via multi-miner consensus. Ask questions, get validated answers with Yes/No verdicts.
apps.longDescription: The AI Oracle uses Cortensor's decentralized inference to provide verified answers. Multiple miners process your query, and the consensus determines the truth. Features include random facts from community results and Oracle Facts with Yes/No verdicts.

apps.name: Research Summarizer
apps.author: Beran
apps.description: Summarize research papers and articles using decentralized AI inference with news integration.
apps.longDescription: Summarize research papers and articles using Cortensor's decentralized AI. Features a side panel with Recent Summaries and News & Articles sections covering Top News, Technology, Science, and Random Articles.

apps.name: Price Analyzer
apps.author: Beran
apps.description: AI-powered market analysis for stocks, crypto, FX, and commodities with live data.
apps.longDescription: Comprehensive market analysis tool that uses Cortensor for AI narratives plus price charts. Features Market Pulse with live price lists, saved analysis history with search, and support for equities, ETFs, crypto, forex, and commodities.

apps.name: X Generator Bot
apps.author: Beran
apps.description: Telegram bot for generating tweets, replies, and threads with AI assistance.
apps.longDescription: Generate tweets, replies, and threads with AI-powered assistance via Telegram. Features role-aware tone guidance, automatic irrelevant word filtering, and friendly error handling.

apps.name: DevNet Chat
apps.author: Beran
apps.description: Multi-model chat interface with session management, code helpers, and quick actions.
apps.longDescription: Multi-model chat interface with per-model presets, session management, and code-focused quick actions. Features welcome starter cards, sidebar insights with model badges and token estimates, and input shortcuts for /summarize, /fix code, /explain.

apps.name: Watcher Bot
apps.author: Jo
apps.description: Discord bot that summarizes dev updates into short, clear versions for easy reading.
apps.longDescription: The Watcher Bot monitors developer updates and transforms long technical logs into short, digestible summaries. Perfect for staying up-to-date without reading through extensive technical documentation.

apps.name: CortexHub
apps.author: Himanshu
apps.description: App Store & Catalog for discovering Cortensor-powered applications.
apps.longDescription: CortexHub is the discovery platform for Cortensor apps. Search, filter, and try community-built applications with one click. Features AI-powered recommendations using Cortensor's /completions endpoint and live network stats.
